entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump Actually according to another set of scholars he is the best President in the US HISTORY! No one was crying prior to COVID19. I seriously doubt that #Trump wanted the best economy in US History shot down by a virus. And if u would rather have #DementiaJoe u need ur head examined!
